It is the first available potion to make with the Herblore skill. A dose of attack potion provides a temporary skill boost to Attack equal to 3 + 10% of the player's current Attack level, rounded down. This is less than the super attack's boost of 5 + 15% of the player's current Attack level, rounded down.

An attack potion is a potion made by using an eye of newt on a guam potion (unf), requiring 3 Herblore, yielding an attack potion(3) and 25 Herblore experience. It is the first available potion to make with the Herblore skill. A dose of attack potion provides a temporary skill boost to Attack equal to 3 + 10% of the player's current Attack level, rounded down. This is less than the super attack's boost of 5 + 15% of the player's current Attack level, rounded down.

After Barbarian Herblore Training, roe or caviar can be added to an attack potion(2), requiring 4 Herblore, yielding an attack mix and 8 Herblore experience. An attack mix has 2 doses, boosts Attack equal to 3 + 10% of the player's current Attack level, rounded down, and heals 3 Hitpoints per dose.

An attack potion(1) spawns in the Deep Wilderness Dungeon.

An attack potion(3) can be purchased from the Warrior Guild Potion Shop for 14 coins or the Legends' Guild General Store for 18 coins.

An attack potion(4) is a reward from Jekyll and Hyde random events if a tarromin is given to Dr. Jekyll.

Effects[edit | edit source]

Attack boost is calculated with: ⌊ A t t a c k L e v e l × 1 10 ⌋ + 3 {\displaystyle \lfloor AttackLevel\times {\frac {1}{10}}\rfloor +3}

Level Boost Level Boost
1-9 +3 50-59 +8
10-19 +4 60-69 +9
20-29 +5 70-79 +10
30-39 +6 80-89 +11
40-49 +7 90-99 +12

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
15 April 2016
(update)

Half full potions could now be turned into bank placeholders.

29 March 2004
(update)

The 4 dose potion became permanently available with the launch of RuneScape 2.

9 March 2004
(update)

The 4 dose potion was added to the RuneScape 2 Beta.

An '''attack potion''' is a [[Herblore#Potions|potion]] made by using an [[eye of newt]] on a [[guam potion (unf)]], requiring 3 [[Herblore]], yielding an attack potion(3) and 25 Herblore [[experience]]. It is the first available potion to make with the Herblore skill. A dose of attack potion provides a [[temporary skill boost]] to [[Attack]] equal to 3 + 10% of the player's current Attack level, rounded down. This is less than the [[super attack]]'s boost of 5 + 15% of the player's current Attack level, rounded down.

After [[Barbarian Training#Barbarian Herblore|Barbarian Herblore Training]], [[roe]] or [[caviar]] can be added to an attack potion(2), requiring 4 Herblore, yielding an [[attack mix]] and 8 Herblore experience. An attack mix has 2 doses, boosts Attack equal to 3 + 10% of the player's current Attack level, rounded down, and heals 3 [[Hitpoints]] per dose.

An attack potion(1) spawns in the [[Deep Wilderness Dungeon]].

An attack potion(3) can be purchased from the [[Warrior Guild Potion Shop]] for {{NoCoins|14}} coins or the [[Legends Guild General Store.|Legends' Guild General Store]] for {{NoCoins|18}} coins.

An attack potion(4) is a reward from [[Jekyll and Hyde]] [[random event]]s if a [[tarromin]] is given to Dr. Jekyll.
==Effects==
Attack boost is calculated with: <math>\lfloor AttackLevel \times \frac{1}{10} \rfloor + 3</math>
